snippet.title: Far Cry 6: Cinematic Title Sequence Trailer | Ubisoft Forward
snippet.description:
Watch the cinematic title sequence of Far Cry 6 and discover Yara, the island frozen in time.

Far Cry 6 will be available February 18th, 2021 on PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4,  Xbox Series X, Xbox One, Uplay, Uplay+, Epic Games and Stadia. Pre-order now at https://ubi.li/z7iWO

Pre-order now and get access to the Libertad Pack which includes the “Libertad Outfit” for your loyal Chorizo and the state-of-the-art “Discos Locos”, a weaponized disc launcher that will make your enemies dance on their own graves

Follow Far Cry 6 :
WEBSITE: https://www.farcry.com
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/ubisoft
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/farcry
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/FarCrygame
